headline: Did Diverging Earnings Forecasts and Zacks Rank Just Shift Texas Instruments' (TXN) Investment Narrative?
summary: In recent weeks, Texas Instruments has drawn attention ahead of its upcoming earnings release, with analysts expecting earnings per share of US$1.28 and revenue growth of more than 10% compared with the prior year. What stands out is the contrast between these growth expectations and the company’s Zacks Rank #4 (Sell), underscoring how divided sentiment is as investors reassess Texas Instruments’ outlook. We’ll now examine how this mix of softer earnings expectations and cautious analyst...

headline: 3 Reasons TXN is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, Texas Instruments’s shares have sunk to $181.46, producing a disappointing 9.1% loss - a stark contrast to the S&P 500’s 13.6% gain. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
